item.title: Docs: Category Theory
item.description:
WIP: Placeholder page - Will focus on the parts of Category Theory that have been found to be most useful to Functional Programming.

  • Bartosz Milewski - Category Theory for Programmers
  • YouTube: Bartosz Milewski - Category Theory
  • Bartosz Milewski - The Dao of Functional Programming
  • YouTube: David Spivak - Category Theory
  • YouTube: TheCatsers
  • nLab: Type Theory
  • Steven Awodey - Homotopy and Type Theory
  • Book: Steven Awodey - Homotopy and Type Theory
  • Curry-Howard correspondence
  • Cartesian closed category
  • Book: Lawvere & Schanuel - Conceptual Mathematics, 2nd edition
